ygData.subject: Re: War
ygData.msgSnippet: ... ONE! ... Blender moved next to Stronghold, the shell hit the ground and exploded. Blender took more damage than Stronghold did. Stronghold still stood,

> Breakdown turned his head to Dark One.  "Slag!  You dirty Maximal-loving
> freaks!" ye yelled, transforming into his artillery mode.  "ASSIST DARK
ONE!"
> he yelled loudly, firing off a two foot long shell that would explode on
> impact (artillery as in cannon, only cannon from 21st century) at Blender.

Blender moved next to Stronghold, the shell hit the ground and exploded.
Blender took more damage than Stronghold did. Stronghold still stood,
Blender was on the ground. Stronghold moved in front of Blender and stood
his ground. He fired 2 fast missiles at Dark One and yelled out a quick:
"Ha!"

> Pyro watched Dark One fall.  "Not very nice." he chuckled, firing off
three
> fire balls at Blender.

Stronghold took the abuse easily for Blender. He was much tougher than the
rest. Deemos fires at Pyro. He then hides behind the base.

> Hiss fired off three blasts from his fusion cannon at Stronghold's left
knee.

Stronghold's knee made on odd sound that made him look pained, but he stood
to protect his partner.

> Scavenger fired off 25 explosive shells at Stronghold's abdomen.

Stronghold was hit from the side and moved to the side, some, but still
stood to protect his partner. Rizopas throws 2 grenades at Scavenger that he
got from Doom Ice, they looked normal, but when they touched the ground or
anywhere else, they exploded violently and threw shrapnel. The grenade went
flying straight towards Scavenger.

> Dark Claw saw his leader fall.  "My brother, I will avenge you.  Flesh
> Ripper, aid him, I must finish what I have started." Dark Claw's voice
boomed
> from his attack vehicle mode.  Arming the launchers, he fired off two more
> missiles at the Mafia base.

Base damage for entire post: The base was hit by the missiles, all 4, and
still stood because of it's armor, even if the shields were down, the die
cast contructed base was still standing, but was still greatly damaged. The
6 bolts hit the base and did minimal damage, especially when compared with
the missiles...
